Title: Gladys
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: Laurie's resolve is put to the test in the wake of a brutal hate crime. After his latest initiatives to maintain the peace in Mapleton fall short, Kevin turns down an outside offer to rid the town of its problems.
